summary.span: 指定应用程序安装是否会在桌面上创建一个快捷方式。如果为 True，则安装会在桌面上创建应用程序的快捷方式。

span.span: Specifies whether the application install will create a shortcut on the desktop If True, the installation will create a shortcut to the application on the desktop.

summary.span: 默认值为 False 如果 Install 为 False，则该值将被忽略

span.span: The default is False If Install is False, this value will be ignored

value.span: “True”或“False”。

span.span: "true" or "false".

value.span: 一个包含值的字符串，该值指示是否创建桌面快捷方式。

span.span: A string that contains a value that indicates whether to create a desktop shortcut.

summary.span: 指定应用程序的更新位置。

span.span: Specifies the update location for the application.

summary.span: 如果未指定此输入，则不会为应用程序定义更新位置。

span.span: If this input is not specified then no update location will be defined for the application.

summary.span: 但是，如果指定了应用程序更新，则必须指定更新位置。

span.span: However, if application updates are specified then the update location must be specified.

summary.span: 指定的值应为完全限定的 URL 或 UNC 路径。

span.span: The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or UNC path.

value.span: 指示应用程序更新位置的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the update location for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此属性，则不会为应用程序定义任何更新位置。If this property is not specified, no update location will be defined for the application. 但是，如果指定了应用程序更新，则必须指定更新位置。However, if application updates are specified, the update location must be specified. 指定的值应为完全限定的 URL 或通用命名约定 (UNC) 路径。The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.

summary.span: 指定是否应阻止应用程序通过 URL 激活。

span.span: Specifies whether the application should be blocked from being activated via a URL.

summary.span: 如果此选项为 True，则仅可从用户的“开始”菜单激活应用程序。

span.span: If this option is True then application can only be activated from the user's Start menu.

summary.span: 默认值为 False。

span.span: The default is False.

summary.span: 如果 Install 属性为 False，则忽略此选项。

span.span: This option is ignored if the Install property is False.

value.span: 如果阻止通过 URL 启动应用程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is blocked from being started by means of a URL otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此选项为 `true` ，则应用程序只能从用户的 " **开始** " 菜单启动。If this option is `true`, the application can only be started from the user's **Start** menu. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. 如果为，则忽略此选项 `false` 。This option is ignored if is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Install { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Install : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定应用程序是已安装应用程序还是仅联机应用程序。

span.span: Specifies whether the application is an installed application or an online only application.

summary.span: 如果此标志为 True，则应用程序将安装在用户的“开始”菜单上，并且可以从“添加/删除程序”对话框中将其删除。

span.span: If this flag is True the application will be installed on the user's Start menu, and can be removed from the Add/Remove Programs dialog.

summary.span: 如果此标志为 False，则应用程序适用于在网页上联机使用。

span.span: If this flag is False then the application is intended for online use from a web page.

summary.span: 默认值为 True。

span.span: The default is True.

value.span: 如果应用程序是已安装应用程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application is an installed application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则应用程序将安装在用户的 " **开始** " 菜单上，并且可以使用控制面板中的 " **添加或删除程序** " 将其删除。If this property is set to `true`, the application will be installed on the user's **Start** menu, and it can be removed by using **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel. 默认值为 `true`。The default is `true`. 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则应用程序将从网页联机使用并且仅在联机时可用。If this property is set to `false`, the application is intended for online use from a Web page and is available online only. > [!NOTE] > 对于 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序，必须将 属性设置为 `true` ，并且还必须将设置 为 `false` 。For WPF Web Browser Applications, you must set the property to `true`, and you must also set to `false`. 如果不满足此条件，您将收到 [MSBuild 错误 MSB3116](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb383983(v=vs.140))。If this condition is not met, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/bb383983(v=vs.140)).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MapFileExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.MapFileExtensions : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定是否使用“.deploy”文件扩展名映射。

span.span: Specifies whether or not the ".deploy" file extension mapping is used.

summary.span: 如果此标志为 true，则将使用“.deploy”文件扩展名发布每个应用程序文件。

span.span: If this flag is true then every application file is published with a ".deploy" file extension.

summary.span: 此选项限制文件扩展名的数量（需要取消阻止这些文件扩展名，才能启用 ClickOnce 应用程序部署），有助于提升 Web 服务器安全性。

span.span: This option is useful for web server security to limit the number of file extensions that need to be unblocked to enable ClickOnce application deployment.

summary.span: 默认值为 false。

span.span: The default is false.

value.span: 如果使用 .deploy 文件扩展名映射，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if .deploy file extension mapping is used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则将使用 .deploy 文件扩展名发布每个程序文件。If this property is set to `true`, every program file is published with a .deploy file extension. 此设置对 Web 服务器安全非常有用，可以限制必须取消阻止的文件扩展名以启用 ClickOnce 应用程序部署。This setting is useful for Web server security to limit the number of file extensions that have to be unblocked to enable ClickOnce application deployment. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`.

summary.span: 指定用户是否可以跳过更新。

span.span: Specifies whether or not the user can skip the update.

summary.span: 如果用户的版本低于所需的最低版本，则用户将无法选择跳过更新。

span.span: If the user has a version less than the minimum required, he or she will not have the option to skip the update.

summary.span: 默认情况下，不需要最低版本。

span.span: The default is to have no minimum required version.

summary.span: 仅当 Install 为 True 时，才应用此输入。

span.span: This input only applies when Install is True.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示所需的应用程序的最低版本号。

span.span: A string indicating the minimum required version number for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果用户的计算机的应用程序版本低于此属性指定的所需最低版本，则用户将无法选择跳过更新。If the user's computer has a version of the application that is lower than the minimum required version specified by this property, the user will not have the option to skip the update. 默认情况下，不需要最低版本。The default is to have no minimum required version. 仅当设置为时，此输入才适用 `true` 。This input applies only when is set to `true`.

summary.span: 指定应用程序的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the application.

summary.span: 如果未指定此输入，则将从生成的清单的标识中推断该名称。

span.span: If this input is not specified then the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest.

summary.span: 该名称将用作“开始”菜单上的快捷方式名称，且将作为“添加/删除程序”对话框中显示的名称的一部分。

value.span: 指示应用程序的名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有为此属性指定任何值，则将从生成的清单的标识中推断该名称。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest. 此名称用于 " **开始** " 菜单上的快捷方式名称，并且是显示在 "控制面板" 的 " **添加或删除程序** " 中的名称的一部分。This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有为此属性指定任何值，则将从已注册的用户或生成的清单的标识中推断该名称。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the registered user or from the identity of the generated manifest. 此名称用于 " **开始** " 菜单上的文件夹名称，是在 "控制面板" 的 " **添加或删除程序** " 中显示的名称的一部分。This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

summary.span: 指定是否应使 URL 查询字符串参数对应用程序可用。

span.span: if URL query-string parameters are available to the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则可向应用程序提供 URL 查询字符串参数。If this property is set to `true`, URL query-string parameters are available to the application. 默认值为 `false` ，指定将无法使用应用程序的参数。The default is `false`, specifying that parameters will not be available to the application.

span.span: This input only applies when Install and UpdateEnabled are both True.

value.span: 一个整数，指示应用程序的更新间隔。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode UpdateMode { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode value); };

summary.span: 指定是在启动应用程序之前在前台检查更新，还是在应用程序运行时在后台检查更新。

span.span: Specifies whether updates should be checked in the foreground before starting the application, or in the background as the application is running.

summary.span: 默认值为“Background”。

span.span: The default is "Background".

summary.span: 仅当 Install 和 UpdateEnabled 均为 True 时，才应用此输入。

span.span: This input only applies when Install and UpdateEnabled are both True.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示是在应用程序启动之前，还是应用程序运行时检查更新。

span.span: An object that indicates whether updates should be checked before the application is started, or while the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `Foreground` ，则会在前台检查更新。If this property is set to `Foreground`, updates are checked in the foreground. 默认值为 `Background`。The default is `Background`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 仅当 和均设置为时，才应用此输入 `true` 。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit UpdateUnit { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit value); };

span.span: Specifies the units for UpdateInterval input.

summary.span: 仅当 Install 和 UpdateEnabled 均为 True 时，才应用此输入。

span.span: This input only applies when Install and UpdateEnabled are both True.

value.span: 一个 对象，指示用于 属性的单位。

span.span: An object that indicates the units used for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下值适用于用于更新间隔的单位： `Days` 、 `Hours` 和 `Weeks` 。The following values are available for the units used for the update interval: `Days`, `Hours`, and `Weeks`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 仅当 和均设置为时，才应用此输入 `true` 。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

summary.span: 执行各项检查以验证该清单的有效性。

span.span: Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest.

summary.span: 在 对象中报告任何生成的错误或警告。

span.span: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::CompatibleFramework ^> ^ XmlCompatibleFrameworks { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::CompatibleFramework ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::CompatibleFramework ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 元素的数组，这些元素表示应用程序可在其上运行的 .NET Framework 的版本。

span.span: Gets or sets the array of XML elements that represent the versions of the .NET Framework that an application can run on.

value.span: 一个 类，该类表示应用程序可在其上运行的 .NET Framework 的版本。
